folder: Grand Concourse & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY
text:
(1)
Grand Concourse, west side, between Bedford Park Boulevard and East 204th Street (at the head of East 202nd Street), showing the St. Philip Neri Roman Catholic Church.
May 8, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(2)
The same, from a different angle. To the right of the church is the rectory.
May 8, 1928
P. L. Sperr

(3)
The rear of the church, on the east side of Villa Avenue.
May 5, 1938
P. L. Sperr
